TopicTitle: Duct Tape Galore (Or how i learned to stop caring and use more boosters)

Articles.Content:
I use a gratuitious amount of struts to keep this Orbital Habitation Module stable during lift-off.

And SRBs in order to jettison the Liquid Rocket Boosters after they get me to above 13km in atmosphere.

Mod(s) pictured:

Umbra Space Industries OKS

Everything else is stock, i think.
I think you should just do multiple launches.
Wow, the necropost, and WOW, that's a lot of struts!
